div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Sahs will be distributing food through Preferred Meals for students 18 and younger on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9-10AM, beginning March 19th. and continuing through the end of the school year. Please go to the Community Room, Door #23, for a Grab and Go bag consisting of two-three meals of breakfast and lunch.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: The buttons for the Spanish and Polish language offer a quick translation. Links for the documents will not work in the translated page. For a full translation with the document links, click on the Permanent Translation button.

Los botones para el idioma español y polaco ofrecen una traducción rápida. Los enlaces para los documentos no funcionarán en la página traducida. Para obtener una traducción completa con los enlaces de documentos, haga clic en el botón Permanent Translation.

Przyciski do języka hiszpańskiego i polskiego oferują szybkie tłumaczenie. Łącza do dokumentów nie będą działać na przetłumaczonej stronie. Aby uzyskać pełne tłumaczenie z łączami do dokumentów, kliknij przycisk Permanent Translation.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The mission of Charles J. Sahs School, in cooperation with students, parents and community, is to provide a safe educational environment that encourages all children to reach their fullest potential while promoting academic growth, building character, developing citizenship, and creating life-long learners.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: The website translations are provided for your convenience only. In case of content discrepancies, the English language is the only officially recognized and School Board approved.
